name: AWS Training and Certification
short: A program offered by AWS to help individuals and organizations build cloud skills and validate expertise with industry-recognized credentials.
description: AWS Training and Certification is a program designed to educate users about Amazon Web Services' cloud products, solutions, and services. It offers both digital and classroom training options. Users can choose from courses based on role, solution area, or level of expertise. It includes pathways for cloud practitioners, architects, developers, and operations roles. The certification validates the knowledge and skills of users in using AWS services efficiently, helping in career advancement in the field of cloud computing.
